items.name: M.S. Pipes of class 'C'
items.specs: Conforming to IS 1239/3589 with all fittings like anchor, fastener, bends, elbow, toes, coupling flange, reducer including primer and 2 coats of post office red enamel paint with welding work.

items.name: Air release valve
items.specs: Gun Metal, sufficient rating with control valve and fixing accessories complete.

items.name: Pressure Gauges
items.specs: With gun metal / brass valves and siphon tube and control valve.

items.name: Cast Iron Butterfly Valves
items.specs: PN 1.6 with matching flange nuts, bolts, washers, and gaskets as per IS 13095 with ISI make.

items.name: Hose Box
items.specs: 750mm X 600mm X 250mm, made out of MS sheet 36 gauge with double glazed doors of 4mm thick with lock and key arrangements, capable of storing 2 Nos. of fire hose of 15 meters and one branch pipe, power coated.

items.name: RRL Hose Pipe
items.specs: As per IS 636 type 'B' ISI mark with male & female heavy-duty stainless steel coupling with ISI mark and copper binding, rubberized fabric lined hose.

items.name: 63mm dia SS Branch pipe
items.specs: With SS nozzle 20mm nominal bore outlet with standard instantaneous type 63mm dia coupling.

items.name: Single Headed Oblique Type SS Fire Hydrant Valve
items.specs: Stainless coupling as per IS903 with ISI Mark, complete with wheel and chain blank cap and confirming to IS 5290.

items.name: First type aid fire hose reel
items.specs: 20 mm dia, 30 mtr. long reinforced rubber tubing conforming to IS: 444 Type II or thermoplastic reinforced hose reel tubing conforming to IS :12585 Type with Shutoff Nozzle Gunmetal & Hose Drum.

items.name: Anticorrosive Wrapping & coating treatment
items.specs: For underground pipes as per relevant standard.

items.name: Concrete block for pipeline holding
items.specs: For holding 150 mm pipeline including c-clamp, anchor bolt etc (size 1.00L x 1.00W x 2.00H foot).

full_text_summary: The bid document outlines the supply of various fire safety equipment and associated components, particularly focusing on pipes, valves, hoses, and fittings meeting specified IS standards. Technical specifications for each item detail materials and construction requirements, suggesting a high degree of compliance with industrial regulations. Comprehensive details are given for each equipment piece, ensuring clarity on size, material, and application standards. The document lacks explicit details on financial and experience requirements, document submission guidelines, and specific buyer terms or exemptions.
